comments.body:
{{ebs1}} is not show in metadata categories anymore.

{noformat}
ubuntu@euca-10-111-52-112:~$ curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/block-device-mapping/
ami
emi
ephemeral0
{noformat}

{noformat}
